name: The Impossible Game (itch)
description:
The Impossible Game is a 2d game written in C++ where you have to reach the final area (green square) without hitting any obstacle (except for walls). The difficulty of each level is rated using stars. However, the levels are difficult since the beginning. If you got bored from losing a level, you can try another one by going to "Levels".

Enjoy!

Ps: If you don't like the game or have a bug contact me for a refund and I'll give your money back if you want or send you another hard game. It's only available for Windows.
